content: Hi all! I've just opened #75138, which will close #61132. It introduces a derive macro to allow structs to be used to define diagnostics (so, you'll be able to do something like tcx.sess.emit_err(FieldAlreadyDeclared{ .. })). It's still work-in-progress, but it's usable, and I'd appreciate some feedback, suggestions and bikeshedding for what I've currently got. Thanks in advance!
